page.title: 20A Typical Day
page.content:
I get up between 0730 and 0800,dress and go downstairs for breakfast which is usually cereals or toast.Then I pack my bag and go to school where I wait for my friends and go to the shop for some sweets.We go into school at 0900 and into assembly after register. Afterwards we do maths or English until a break that lasts for 15 minutes.Then we do English or maths until lunchtime when we eat our sandwiches.In the afternoon we do craft or games or social studies until 1530 when we go home.There is a mid- afternoon break at 1420 until 1430. I have tea about 1630 then I go and play until 2030 or 2100 when I go home and watch the television in bed before going to sleep.
{Written by Ashley Gray,aged 12 years.
